name: Spiral Library Climb
description: Inspired by the Grand Libraryâ€™s towering spiral staircase, this level forces the pilot to thread a drone upward through tightening coils and sudden hazards. A Metal Barrel guards the stair entry, three high-output Fans simulate unpredictable updrafts in the narrow core, and a hulking Portable Fusion Reactor pinches the landing at roughly three-quarters height. Near the stair crown, a Wooden Room Divider squeezes the exit path while assorted furniture and crates scattered through adjacent rooms reinforce the sense of a cluttered, historic mansion. Lighting is set a little dimmer than normal to mimic an old-world library ambiance, and light wind is enabled to amplify the fan-driven turbulence. The player launches just outside the stairwell, hits two mandatory mid-stair checkpoints, and finally pops out through the skylight at the very top.
